TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2AudienceRestriction extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the AudienceRestriction element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.5.1.4].

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is empty, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown during serialization.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with no Audience elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> property is initialized to an empty collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Uri> audiences) cil managed

Docs.param: The collection of that contains the Audience elements contained in this restriction.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized using the elements of the specified collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri audience) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the contents of the Audience element contained in this restriction.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized with the specified Audience element.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of URIs that specifies the audiences to which the assertion is addressed. The condition is valid if the relying party is a member of any of the specified audiences.
Docs.value: A collection of type that specifies the audiences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Audience elements contained by the AudienceRestriction element.
